subject: Citizenship and Naturalization
Boxing
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: Erick De Leon, a 19-year-old boxing champion who is from Mexico but living in Detroit, was sworn in as a United States citizen. He is aiming for the 2012 Games.
snippet: Erick De Leon, a 19-year-old boxing champion who is from Mexico but living in Detroit, was sworn in as a United States citizen. He is aiming for the 2012 Games.
